list.title: RiseMessage~Head
list.description: Protocol headers included in every rise message.

list.title: module:rise
list.description: Rise is a protocol for decentalized, eclipse-resistant identities.

list.title: module:rise~EncryptedRiseMessage
list.description: Interface for an encrypted message.

list.title: module:rise~EncryptedRiseMessage#decrypt
list.description: Decrypts the message using the supplied private key.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity
list.description: Rise private identity bundle. This is the primary interface for using this module. Allows to generate new identities and use them as the context for protected operations.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity#fingerprint
list.description: 160 bit solution hash.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity#lock
list.description: Creates an encrypted blob representation of this identity, suitable for persistance to disk.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity#message
list.description: Constructs an encrypted and signed {@link RiseMessage} for the given public key.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity#mnemonic
list.description: BIP39 recovery words.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity#salt
list.description: Used for local PBKDF2.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity#secret
list.description: Underlying secret key.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity#solution
list.description: Underlying equihash solution.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity#solve
list.description: Creates a new {@link RiseSolution} for this identity. This method updates the internal state and will overwrite any previous solution performed in this context.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity#toJSON
list.description: Returns a plain object representation of this identity, serializable to JSON.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity.K
list.description: Equihash K parameter (length).

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity.MAGIC
list.description: Rise magic number. Used as message terminator and protocol identitifier.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity.N
list.description: Equihash N parameter (width in bits).

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity.SALT
list.description: Rise default salt for pbkdf2 operations.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity.TEST_K
list.description: Lowered length for testing.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity.TEST_MAGIC
list.description: Magic number to segment test network.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity.TEST_N
list.description: Lowered width for testing.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity.TEST_Z
list.description: Lowered difficulty for testing.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity.Z
list.description: Default difficuly setting. Require this many leading zeroes in solution proofs.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity.generate
list.description: "Mines" a new {@link RiseIdentity} and iteratively generates {@link RiseSolution}s until one is found that satisfies the stated difficulty.

list.title: module:rise~RiseIdentity.unlock
list.description: Decrypts the blob given the password and creates a new instance.

list.title: module:rise~RiseMessage
list.description: Interface allowing for authenticated message exchange.

list.title: module:rise~RiseMessage#body
list.description: Key-value pairs given for the message.

list.title: module:rise~RiseMessage#encrypt
list.description: Encrypts the message state for the public key provided.

list.title: module:rise~RiseMessage#head
list.description: Default message headers, plus any custom ones supplied.

list.title: module:rise~RiseMessage#sign
list.description: Signs the message state using the private key provided.

list.title: module:rise~RiseMessage#toBuffer
list.description: Serializes the message to wire format.

list.title: module:rise~RiseMessage#unwrap
list.description: Returns only the body of this message.

list.title: module:rise~RiseMessage#validate
list.description: Ensures the solution header is valid.

list.title: module:rise~RiseMessage.fromBuffer
list.description: Creates a new message instance from the serialized message.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSecret
list.description: Interface for secp256k1 key pair. If no secret is provided, one will be generated.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSecret#decrypt
list.description: Decrypts the given data using the underlying private key.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSecret#publicKey
list.description: Public key derived from private key.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSecret#sign
list.description: Creates a digital signature from the provided data.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSolution
list.description: Interface for identity solutions.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSolution#difficulty
list.description: Number of leading zeroes in the proof.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSolution#epoch
list.description: Network magic number.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSolution#fingerprint
list.description: RIPEMD-160 hash for SHA-256 hash of serialized solution.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSolution#getProofAsBinaryString
list.description: Represents the proof as a string of 1's and 0's.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSolution#nonce
list.description: Solution nonce.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSolution#proof
list.description: Equihash proof.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSolution#pubkey
list.description: Public key.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSolution#toJSON
list.description: Serilaizes the solution into a JSON object.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSolution#verify
list.description: Ensures that the solution is valid.

list.title: module:rise~RiseSolution.fromJSON
list.description: Constructs a {@link RiseSolution} from a JSON object.

list.title: module:rise~SignedRiseMessage
list.description: Interface for digitall signed rise message

list.title: module:rise~SignedRiseMessage#verify
list.description: Ensures that the digita signature is valid.

list.title: module:rise~privateKey
list.description: Underlying private key.
